channel.title: Wolfenstein
channel.description:
The new one, released a few days ago.
I just recently started playing the original wolfenstein3d again a few days ago, and it is every bit as awesome as I remember it back in the day, and here it is a few days later and they came out with a new one.
Has anyone played it, and what are your impressions? I might play it soon, but I'm not going to buy it because they don't have a linux port, or plans for one.
If anyone can compare it to the original one in terms of fun and gameplay, that would be great. :D

item.title: Wolfenstein
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

if i were to ever play an RTS again it would have to be the original command and conquer
EDIT: have been playing the new wolfenstein and its pretty good, however id imagine had i played the original i would hate it. This happens when companies try to revive old things and they do it in a completly different style to the original so the old fans dont like it.

Read full topic

if i were to ever play an RTS, it would have to be a quality one such as starcraft II
